Blog.post: hmm... i wander if this is actually used for sumthin else other than posting random bullshit on a site... hmm i wander! as jordan sayd b4... do the people really ponder what they think?? i have no idea wat that means but O WELL! well hmm if i post random bullshit... will it piss any one off? lol cuz i unno i like to write down shit to get it out of mah head! well ill start with tha normal im SARA... ppl normally call me sara but dont get that confuzed with my REAL name sara... im a sophomore at Assumption and if yoo don kno wat that is... then u suck! y am i even tellin any one this?? lol its kinda amusing actually! and tha only person that will prolly read this is muah and some other random weird ppl that are just as bored as i am now! so that means im not gunna worry about perfect grammer hell i dun even kno how to make a full sentance! today was actually a BAD day even tho i did take a bubble bath listening to jimmy buffet with my victoria secret bath wash and mah speashial coconut mango shampoo that normally helps bcuz yesterday was equally as bad but then after gettin out of tha shower a very annoying person called... josh and just annoyed tha hell out of me and then jake... tha truth is i relee like jake and hes RELEE cute i mean hes not that sexzy kind of hott that wood keep a gurl staren fer hours but he is... cute and hes mah ex's lil brother and yea thats tha major mistake of myne i let mah self get too close now it ended with me breaking up with raymond and then gettin mah self hurt and his parents hating me! and it all happened in one day!! well enuff of that depressing shit i don like to b depressed i enjoy being happy i mean y waste mah time on bein sad? ill spend tommorow at tha movie theatre watchin spiderman 2 with jessica and christina i always seem to run into sumone i kno there and actually its TONS of fun espeshially wen tha crazy sexzy person... justin is sniffing pixie sticks and throwing sugar packets evrywhere and when evryones taking pictures and wow its fun! and wen radom skinny ppl *cough* ryan *cough* fall from the sky and land on fat ppl... and they wander y they kick us out of tha movies!? lol i got mah self a plan.. and that wood b to 1. stop callin jake and ray and josh get out of that damn rut and move on 2. go to tha kicken ass 4th of july party this weekend and meet a new guy there 3. touch brandons tie! :. RANDOM THOT OF THE DAY.: If the world was backwards would yoo actually be chased by the icecream man? and if so cood you get ur ice cream b4 all of those other dorks that have to have 6 popsicles and would the icecream man actually b sexzi? ok enuff of that that was actually just to see if html worked on this thang and that was just mah thot i thot wen i thot i woke up! sara
he he wow this is actually kinda cool!
